answers.answer: I have. I told my doctor and she monitored the baby. I managed ti gain a big ten pounds in the last month and baby came out perfectly healthy. Don't starve yourself but as long as you and your doc are on the same page your fine. Even with number three now im losing weight but the belly is growing.  Its a shared diet. You lose your baby gains. Win win. :)

I was overweight when I fell pregnant with my last baby. It was alcohol that made me overweight so when I was pregnant and wasn't drinking I ended up being 2lb lighter when I had my baby than when I fell pregnant. My doctors where not concerned at all and. I had a 7lb 11 baby boy at 39 week's. I had so much energy and felt great throughout the whole pregnancy. I am now 31 weeks pregnant again and haven't gained a pound so far either. I'd say I will now I'm at the end but I'm not worried either way :-)
Wow thanks ladies! That helps alot!
I have lost 27 lbs I am 21 weeks.

My first pregnancy I got pregnant at 262lbs and delivered at 270lb. The day after delivery I weighed 230lb. This pregnancy is going the same way. I always eat  well. I walked and swam often. I had a normal pregnancy, no complications, no diabetes, no swelling etc. Vaginal delivery. Good luck!!
I have lost 31 lbs my whole pregnancy now since 36 weeks i started back gaining... they say its normal if you are over weight

question: Hi I'm wondering if anyone is overweight/obese and changed their eating habits since pregnancy to clean eating or healthier foods and has managed to lose weight. I am 7 wks prego and have decided to change my eating habits completey. Since I am overweight I thinking I will lose weight not because I will eat less just because the type of foods will be a lot mire healthier and I will be making sure I get all necessary nutrients my baby needs and no empty calories from junk food. Anyone dealt with this?
title: Overweight and losing weight while prego?
